description: Test cases for notification center and alerts

test_cases.name: Display Notifications Screen
test_cases.expected_result: Notifications screen displays with header 'Notifications' and 'Important updates' subtitle

test_cases.name: Display Payment Reminder Notification
test_cases.expected_result: Payment reminder card shows title and details (e.g., '2 players still need to pay for Badminton 19:00')

test_cases.name: Display Slot Opened Notification
test_cases.expected_result: Notification shows venue, time, and distance (e.g., 'A slot opened at BlueCourt 20:00 — 0.8 km away')

test_cases.name: Empty Notifications State
test_cases.expected_result: Empty state message displayed indicating no new notifications

test_cases.name: Click Payment Reminder Notification
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to relevant booking or payment screen

test_cases.name: Click Slot Opened Notification
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to session or venue details

test_cases.name: Navigate Back to Home
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated back to Home screen

test_cases.name: Notification List Ordering
test_cases.expected_result: Notifications displayed in reverse chronological order (newest first)

test_cases.name: Receive New Notification
steps: Trigger notification-worthy event (e.g., player joins session)
test_cases.expected_result: New notification appears in Notifications screen

test_cases.name: Notification Badge on Home
test_cases.expected_result: Badge or indicator shows unread notification count
